overview: Legendary star Ginger Lynn explores her strong lesbian tendencies in this compelling look at the blonde star's life. Paired with one of the hottest new starlets and fellow legends, Ginger demonstrates her power and range as one of the most beloved sex performers of all time. Shot in documentary form, Ginger talks candidly about her past lesbian relationships, and for the first time ever discusses her notorious romance with actor Charlie Sheen. With candid interviews, hot lesbian sex and first time legendary pairings, Ginger Loves Girls! is an instant classic. Written and directed by Nica Noelle.
title: Ginger Loves Girls
